metadata.description: Each unique artwork will be split into 4 collectables. Purchase all 4 collectables of an artwork and you will own the entire artwork. You will then receive the 3d model of the artwork, eligible to be used in your own environment in Africarare or hold or trade as you please.
metadata.name: Her Gaze Young Lioness

attributes.value: Own All 4 squares to receive a 3D piece
